title: The Need for Speed: Special Edition (1996) (PC Game) (HereticXS)
description:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The Need for Speed: Special Edition (1996) (PC Game)
Released by HereticXS - specializing in authentic releases of old-school games.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This release was ripped from an authentic physical CD of the original MS-DOS
media. It includes bin/cue CD image files of the original installation CD.

This release includes LaunchBox (and DOSBox) which will allow you to easily play
the game on modern Windows PCs. No configuration or installation is necessary.
Simply run LaunchBox.exe and then double-click on the game to play.

The Need for Speed: Special Edition adds two new race tracks (Burnt Sienna and
Transtropolis), changeable time of day settings, 8-player network/modem support,
in-game music, and Windows 95 support to Need For Speed.

The game lets you drive 8 speed devils including Lamborghini Diablo VT, Ferrari
512TR, and Porsche 911 Carrera. The race tracks are highly detailed with the
help of texture mapped vector graphics. The soundtrack is digitally recorded,
and of professional quality.

Need for Speed SE has indepth coverage of the cars and race tracks. Video clips
of the cars are also included.
